resources.string: "To Have More Floating Shortcuts, Widgets, Enable Automation Features & Preferences Please Purchase Shortcuts PRO."
Go to Settings to Turn Off Steady Mode
Say *OK Google! Open Floating Shortcuts* to Recover All Last Used Shortcuts.

Select an App to create Floating Shortcut & Widget. You can dragNdrop it around the display & Long Press to Remove it.

If You Like Shortcuts App Please Share it with Your Friends.\n Click Here To Open Shortcuts.
Turn On Steady Mode to Enable this Functionality
Please first Read Details then Modify this Features
Shortcuts will create When Turn On WiFi
Shortcuts will create When Turn On Bluetooth
Shortcuts will create When Turn On GPS
Please first Read Details then Modify this Features. Required Permissions Details & More
Simple and Smooth Launcher Integrated to Shortcuts
Please Go To Permissions Section and Allow All Required Permissions
Please Be Patient. It is One-Time Setup
Configure Floating Widgets for All Apps
Bind to Background Services & Enable All Remote Features
Remove Shortcuts When WiFi|Bluetooth|GPS Turned OFF
Select Main Color of Floating Shortcuts and Geeky Launcher.
System Will Recover All Floating Shortcuts That Removed By System.

This is Essential Permission for Basic Functionality of Shortcuts App.

This Permission Allows to Add Floating Shortcuts View on Top of Other Apps.\n You Can Not Use Shortcuts App. Please Grant Permission.

Remote & Smart Features need to Know How you Use Installed Apps. For Example;\n Use OK Google! Command to Run Shortcuts. It Will Recreate last Shortcuts Automatically without Opening the App.

Please Grant Permission to Use these features & Pass this CheckPoint. Click Here to Open Shortcuts.

\nGPS Or Storage Permission is denied. Shortcuts App needs these Permission for better functionality.

Please Grant Permission to Use these features & Pass this CheckPoint. Click Here to Open Shortcuts.

Please Be Patient! It is One-Time Setup.\n Since Android 6 System needs Users to Allow Or Deny Apps Required Permissions. You can Read about Required Permissions for Shortcuts App in Detail in Next Page & Click on each Item to Modify it.
This is Essential Permission for Basic Functionality of Shortcuts App. This Permission Allows to Add Floating Shortcuts View on Top of Other Apps.
Remote & Smart Features need to Know How you Use Installed Apps.\n It does NOT collect Any Personal Info.
To Save some Configurations Shortcuts App needs to Write & Read Files. These Files Help to Optimise App Performance.
GPS Automation Features will create Location Based Shortcuts Or When GPS Sensor Turn ON.\n It does NOT send Any GPS Info.
By This App you can Select an App to create *Floating Shortcut & Widget*.
Please Visit Geeks Empire Apps on Google Play Store
